events.title: Patent-A-Thon
events.description: A two-day patent drafting and innovation showcase where teams presented their patentable ideas before expert panels.
events.location: B4 Seminar Hall, Kalpana Chawla Centre

events.title: Compile to Filed
events.description: A hands-on workshop teaching students patent drafting, documentation, and filing through practical sessions and guided activities.

events.title: Draft to Craft
events.description: An awareness workshop introducing students to patent drafting, IPR basics, and the Patent-a-Thon structure.

events.title: Curie Lab
events.description: A workshop focused on scientific research, effective research paper presentation, and international research opportunities, featuring expert talks and interactive sessions.

events.title: IPR Series Session
events.description: An interactive session for B.Tech CSE students covering basics of IPR, patents, copyrights, trademarks, case studies, and the importance of protecting digital innovation.

events.title: Pixel & Code
events.description: A hands-on two-day workshop introducing students to HTML, CSS, NoSQL, and practical web/app development sessions with expert trainers.
events.time: Day 1: 1 PM - 4 PM, Day 2: 9 AM - 1 PM

events.title: Tech A Hunt
events.description: A science and innovation-themed scavenger hunt conducted across four rounds including aptitude puzzles, image clues, Morse code decoding, and a hangman challenge.

events.title: Synergy'24
events.description: A four-day symposium covering review paper writing, patent filing, research paper development, and a final research symposium competition.
events.location: A3 Seminar Hall, B2 Seminar Hall

events.title: NIPAM IPR Workshop
events.description: An online workshop under the National Intellectual Property Awareness Mission focusing on patents, copyrights, trademarks, and the importance of protecting innovation.
